articles.title: Supreme Court Questions Judge in Cash Row Case
articles.description: The Supreme Court posed tough questions to a judge involved in a cash-related controversy, questioning the timing and validity of the petition filed.

articles.title: Indian Envoy Defends Oil Imports from Russia
articles.description: Vikram Doraiswami, India's High Commissioner to the UK, defended India's oil imports from Russia, responding to Western criticism by emphasizing the need to keep the economy running.

articles.title: 25-Year-Old Dies While Playing Badminton in Hyderabad
articles.description: A 25-year-old man tragically collapsed and died of a heart attack while playing badminton at Nagole Stadium in Hyderabad.
